verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> <S%H4905>Maschil,<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah.<s%> As the <S%H354>hart<s%> <S%H6165>pants<s%> <S%H5921>after<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H650>brooks,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H6165>pants<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H413>after<s%> you, O <S%H430>God.<s%>

My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H6770>thirsts<s%> for <S%H430>God,<s%> for the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H410>God:<s%> <S%H4970>when<s%> shall I <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God?<s%>

My <S%H1832>tears<s%> have <S%H1961>been<s%> my <S%H3899>meat<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night,<s%> while they <S%H3605>continually<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to me, <S%H346>Where<s%> is your <S%H430>God?<s%>

When I <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things, I <S%H8210>pour<s%> out my <S%H5315>soul<s%> in me: for I had <S%H5674>gone<s%> with the <S%H5519>multitude,<s%> I <S%H1718>went<s%> with them to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H7440>joy<s%> and <S%H8426>praise,<s%> with a <S%H1995>multitude<s%> that <S%H2287>kept<s%> holy <S%H2287>day.<s%>

<S%H4100>Why<s%> are you <S%H7817>cast<s%> <S%H7817>down,<s%> O my <S%H5315>soul?<s%> and why are you <S%H1993>disquieted<s%> in me? <S%H3176>hope<s%> you in <S%H430>God:<s%> for I shall <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H3034>praise<s%> him for the <S%H3444>help<s%> of his <S%H6440>countenance.<s%>

O my <S%H430>God,<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H7817>cast<s%> <S%H7817>down<s%> <S%H5921>within<s%> me: <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> will I <S%H2142>remember<s%> you from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and of the <S%H2769>Hermonites,<s%> from the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H4706>Mizar.<s%>

<S%H8415>Deep<s%> <S%H7121>calls<s%> to <S%H8415>deep<s%> at the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of your <S%H6794>waterspouts:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4867>waves<s%> and your <S%H1530>billows<s%> are <S%H5674>gone<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> me.

Yet the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H6680>command<s%> his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> in the day <S%H3119>time,<s%> and in the <S%H3915>night<s%> his <S%H7892>song<s%> shall be with me, and my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> to the <S%H410>God<s%> of my <S%H2416>life.<s%>

I will <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H410>God<s%> my <S%H5553>rock,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> have you <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> me? <S%H4100>why<s%> <S%H3212>go<s%> I <S%H6937>mourning<s%> because of the <S%H3906>oppression<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy?<s%>

As with a <S%H7524>sword<s%> in my <S%H6106>bones,<s%> my <S%H6887>enemies<s%> <S%H2778>reproach<s%> me; while they <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H3605>daily<s%> <S%H3117><s%> to me, <S%H346>Where<s%> is your <S%H430>God?<s%>

<S%H4100>Why<s%> are you <S%H7817>cast<s%> <S%H7817>down,<s%> O my <S%H5315>soul?<s%> and <S%H4100>why<s%> are you <S%H1993>disquieted<s%> <S%H5921>within<s%> me? <S%H3176>hope<s%> you in <S%H430>God:<s%> for I shall <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H3034>praise<s%> him, who is the <S%H3444>health<s%> of my <S%H6440>countenance,<s%> and my <S%H430>God.<s%>
